short_summary: Mechanical Maintenance and Repair Services at Canso Canal, NS
description: The objective of this Standing Offer Agreement (SOA) is to provide and perform Contractor mechanical maintenance and repair works/services at Canso Canal, NS, that includes but shall not be limited to the provision of all labour, equipment, tools, material, transportation to do the work required. Also requires necessary supervision to provide inspection services, repairs, maintenance, upgrades and new installation of mechanical equipment and components of the site, as requested on Call up form.
full_summary:
**Notice Type:** 
(Request for Standing Offer)
**Procurement Category:** [FNCT]
**Tender Description:**  
The intent of this Request for Standing Offer (RFSO) for Mechanical Maintenance and Repair Services at Canso Canal, Nova Scotia, is to award a sole-source Standing Offer (SO) Agreement with a term period of three (3) years, from April 1, 2022, to March 31, 2025.

**Scope of Work:**  
The scope of the contract includes, but is not limited to, the following services:
* Provision of all labour, equipment, tools, materials, and transportation necessary to perform the work required.
* Necessary supervision to provide inspection services, repairs, maintenance, upgrades, and new installations of mechanical equipment and components of the site, as per drawings/designs, details, specifications, statement of work, construction notes, or any other related documents.

**Note to Tenderers:**

* The procurement method is competitive open bidding.
* A Standing Offer Agreement will be awarded to a single contractor who will provide the required maintenance and repair services on call.
* Tenderers must submit a complete set of plans, specifications, and price responsive documentation.
* This is an electronic tendering process, and electronic bidding is the preferred method.
